title: 01-basic-d3-demo
description: A demonstration of building a scatterplot using D3. This is the level of background participants are expected to have before moving through these materials.

title: 02-class-demo
description: This page demonstrates how to leverage Classes in JavaScript.

title: 03-component-demo
description: In this demo, you can see how to create React components that accept information via props.

title: 04-react-intro-exercise
description: In this exercise, participants will walk through creating and rendering React components

title: 05-state-demo
description: This page demonstrates how to keep track of the state of an application.

title: 06-state-exercise
description: This exercise challenges you to leverage the state of an application to keep track of information that changes through user interactions.

title: 07-d3-demo
description: Here, you can see how to leverage D3 to interact with components that are created using React.

title: 08-scatter-exercise
description: In this exercise, you will create a fully functional scatterplot using D3 and React in combination with one another

title: 09-small-multiples-exercise
description: In this exercise, you will see how simple it is to use React to render small multiples fo D3 visualizations.

title: 10-lifting-up-state-exercise
description: In this final exercise, you will use React's ability to lift up state to add interactivty across charts.
